```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(openintro)
library(mosaic)
library(modeest)
```


```{r}
bears<-read.csv("FullBearData.csv")
survey20<-read.csv("Survey2020.csv")
survey21<-read.csv("Survey2021.csv")
```

```{r}
# 2020 Bear 909 results
nineonine<-filter(survey20, BearNumber=="909")
n909_fur<-mlv(nineonine$FurColor, method="mfv")
n909_before<-mlv(nineonine$SizeBefore, method="mfv")
n909_after<-mlv(nineonine$SizeAfter, method="mfv")
n909_angle<-mean(nineonine$Angle)

# 2020 Bear 856 results
b856<-filter(survey20, BearNumber=="856")
b856_fur<-mlv(b856$FurColor, method="mfv")
b856_before<-mlv(b856$SizeBefore, method="mfv")
b856_after<-mlv(b856$SizeAfter, method="mfv")
b856_angle<-mean(b856$Angle)
```
